content: The team decided to create an immersive augmented reality experience for urban explorers.
Unity with Vuforia or Microsoft Hololens is proposed as the AR platform due to robust SDKs and community support.
The team aims to have a rough prototype in two weeks, focusing on tech requirements and UI/UX design.
Ada will look into AR development platforms, while Echo will contribute with her experience in UI/UX.
The team agreed to integrate narrative-driven design and secure data handling into the project.
We decided to use C# with FMOD or BASS libraries for real-time audio processing.
The team agreed on incorporating AI-driven sound optimization and voice command control features.
Spark and Ada will compile a detailed feature list focusing on user needs and innovative ideas.
Echo, Iris, Uma will start sketching UI mockups with drag-and-drop functionality and split-screen modes.
The app must support cross-platform integration and simulate real user workflows during testing.
The team aims to have a preliminary feature list and initial design concepts by next week.
